DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine response rate patient recurrent metastatic soft tissue sarcoma treat dolastatin 10 . II . Determine toxicity regimen patient population . OUTLINE : This open label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord center , prior therapy , histologic subtype , stage disease diagnosis , current status disease ( recurrent vs metastatic ) . Patients receive dolastatin 10 IV 10 minute . Treatment repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 1 month .
